name: test_e2e_with_logs[436_EMRG_MONGO_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `EMRG_MONGO_005` |
| **Name** | MongoDB JavaScript code injection |
| **Category** | OTHER |
| **Subcategory** | mongodb_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'; return db.users.find(); //`
- **Encoded**: `%27%3B%20return%20db.users.find%28%29%3B%20//`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~53000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:32:26.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
